name: Krampus Quest
description: Krampus Quest is a back-to-basics retro-style action-platformer with a christmas theme. Fighting your way up the North Pole, absorbing souls, dodging traps and pitfalls, and upgrading abilities, to in the end battle Santa Claus himself.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 43 MB available space
